title: Poro Rider Sejuani charges into Snowdown

I'm taking the poro.
good choice mate! this skin is great! be sure to get the icon from legend of the poro king too

If you're serious, I could gift you a skin. But you'd have to be patient until Christmas.
SharpNipplz, if your serious, can you plz gift me the snowdown tristana skin. I main tristana and thats all I ever wanted, but my parents don't let me get RP :(
ill do it if we play a game and you drop at least 30 kills with less than 10 deaths, ill give you the amount of time you have to do it if we do play
one skin to rule them all...
One skin to find them
One skin to bring them all and in the darkness bind them
In the Land of Freljord where the Poros lie.

Three skins for PAX conventions under the sky,
Seven for the Battlecast to make metal from stone,
Nine for Urf the Manatee, doomed to die,
One for the Poro Rider on her frozen throne.
One skin to rule them all, one skin to find them.
One skin to bring them all and in the darkness bind them
In the land of Freljord where the Poros lie.
that's a cinnamon bun silly riot. donuts have holes.
Apparently you have never had a Zeppole. Not all donuts have holes, but yes that is definitely a cinnamon bun, it's all swirly and delicious looking {{champion:117}}
u both are wrong its a poro snack :D :D {{item:2010}} {{item:2010}}

so this is what bit the poro snack...
everyone's in it it for the poro, not {{champion:113}}

Sadly yes. :/ 

Now this is going to make me look like a poser for having the skin even though I played {{champion:113}} way before I knew about the skin.
{{champion:13}} of the planet of the {{summoner:31}} 's ?
is poro rider seasonal or is she permanent
Snowdown skin, it says in the article she's going into the vault in January.

I really want to like this skin because I love poros, but I just can't get behind a slight snow particle effect and a hideous red tracksuit. I'm sorry riot, but can you please make it a little less plain? Nearly any other color scheme would have worked. This skin clearly makes Bristles more adorable and awesome, but it made Sejuani herself look so much worse. You did knock the Ori and Malz skins out of the park though. Welp, hopefully Sejuani gets an appealing skin sometime soon, but then again her basic is pretty amazing so I'm fine with quality skin that takes a while to conceptualize.
Isn't it a frosted over {{item:2052}}?
i want to buy this so bad but the buy RP button doesnt do anything ;-;

its also not in the gifting center... rito pls
First is for pansies, it's all about the second bruh. Also love my new skin :D

There is a big fat dead poro rug on the left hand side of the skin, If {{champion:61}}'s skin could counter this skin, It would be mind blowing for me, Im a silver V and i have one more quick suggestion, {{champion:76}} isn't a count to {{champion:31}}... 

{{champion:53}} could use some more skins, could you give him a skin or 2? Oh, And could you do this math? {{champion:222}}  + {{summoner:31}}  = {{champion:222}} {{summoner:31}}
legendofgamer

I wish I was a better jungler with her. I prefer more champions with good sustain, like Yorick, Hecarim and Cho'Gath. I got the skin anyways, because SHES ON  A FREAKING PORO! But if anyone has any good builds for her, I would love to see some.
